title: Retro 80s Dating App Dashboard
description: A visually stunning, premium dating app dashboard with a retro 80s aesthetic using radial gradients, crisp hard shadows, and geometric pattern overlays.
generation_hints: Implement retro 80s aesthetic with radial gradients and neon colors
Use socket.io-client for real-time status updates and messaging
Implement crisp hard shadows for retro depth effect
Add geometric pattern overlays for authentic 80s feel
Use zustand to persist user state and theme preferences
Implement tabbed interface for matches, messages, and settings
Add proper loading states with retro skeleton loaders
Use @tanstack/react-query for efficient data caching
Implement table view for user listings with status badges
Add retro-styled buttons with hover transitions
Use date-fns for relative time formatting
Implement profile verification badge system
Add proper ARIA labels for accessibility
Use proper focus management with retro ring styles
Implement search and filter functionality
Add pagination for user listings
Use neon color scheme (#FF00FF, #FFFF00, #00FFFF) consistently
Implement radial gradients for header/footer sections
Add retro transition effects (e.g., fade, slide)
Implement proper error handling with retro-styled error messages
